description:
Gianini says that Tsuna is unable to make contact, not because his transmitter has a glitch, but because he is so far below the ground that his signals aren`t reaching them. Has he snuck into the depths of Merone Base as planned, or has some accident befallen him? Those remaining in the hideout cannot stop worrying. Meanwhile, Tsuna has passed out and is watching a peaceful dream about his mother pouring tea and his friends` smiles. He wakes up to the sweet-smell of Japanese tea, and finds…
Source: crunchyroll
